FAQ
Frequently Asked Questions

  1. Home
  2. FAQ

Why would I want to keep track of my bills?

We always ask ourselves "where did our money go?". Now you can actually see!
You can also see who received your bill- maybe a friend or a relative?

Why does the app require a facebook login?

Where is Rachel is a social app and there is no better way to be social than facebook.
Do not worry! we do not use any details except your name and your profile picture. We will never post without your permission.

Can the app be used to track other things except money bills?

Yes! We have written the code in a way that allows to "Check In" any location based object with a unique identification.
You can always contact us (see the About page).

Where can I see all the bills I have checked in?

Navigate to the "My bills" page and you can see all the bill IDs you have checked in. Once you press on a bill ID you will see it's route. So... how far did your bill traveled?

I tried to check in a bill and got an error. What should I do?

When you check a bill you have to make sure you have entered a 10 digits ID containing only numbers and that you have approved location sharing with our app. If you did and for some reason you got an error, please contact us.

Is Where is Rachel free?

Sure it is free! We have created it so people will enjoy it.

Who is behind Where is Rachel?

We are a team of three: Yafim, Nofar and Omri. We live in Israel and study Computer Science at the IDC in Herzliya.
